name: Tag Tool
subtitle: Used to Craft Tag Filters, and to get the Tags on items.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Gotten by $(l)Crouch + Right Click (In Air)$() with a $(l:pedestals:tools/filtertool)Filter Tool$()

pages.title: Interactions
pages.text: $(li)With this tool in your $(l)MAINHAND$() and an item in your $(l)OFFHAND, RIGHTCLICK$() it, the chat will display all the tags on the item. $(li)$(l)Crouch Right Click$() in the air to swap this into the $(l:pedestals:tools/upgradetool)Upgrade Tool$()
